location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Charles Edwards, Bushire to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Dr Colvill having departed Shiraz to take over responsibility for the Residency during Pelly's absence but as Edwards has not received official notification either from the Government or from Pelly that Colvill has been appointed he cannot allow him to take control on arrival.Other matters discussed in the letter include an outbreak of epidemic fever in Bushire; Pelly's horses and the Berenicestill being in Bombay.
